general.name: NetLogix - Axcient D2C Installer
general.description: Required: TokenID - can be found in the filename for the client specific installer Optional: Password Backup Volumes

variable.name: usrTokenID
variable.description: Token ID can be located in the file name of the client specific agent installer

variable.name: usrPassword
variable.description: Password used for backups, this MUST be documented.

variable.name: usrVolumes
variable.description: Comma separated list of volumes to backup. Leave at all to backup all volumes
